# Accessibility Standards for Educational Artifacts

- **Contrast & Type**: High contrast; min 24pt body on slides; semantic headings in docs.
- **Alt Text**: Provide alt text for informative images/diagrams.
- **Color Independence**: Do not rely on color alone.
- **Media**: Captions/transcripts for audio/video.
- **Keyboard**: Ensure keyboard navigation where applicable.
- **Language**: Clear, inclusive language; avoid idioms where unnecessary.
- **Docs**: Export with tagged PDFs/semantic MD for screen readers.
